list_definition.definition: to bring or come back to consciousness after being asleep

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He woke to find that it was raining
Go and wake the others, will you?

list_definition.definition: a strip of smooth-looking or foamy water left behind a ship

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We saw dolphins jumping and playing in the wake left by the boat.
